ygData.subject: Re: Staff of writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: i haven t checked south karana, but there is an erudite in south ro named Rathmana.  dunno if same guy tho. Shada Silverleaf, level 39 bard, Mith Marr ...
ygData.messageBody:
i haven't checked south karana, but there is an erudite in south ro named
Rathmana. dunno if same guy tho.

Shada Silverleaf, level 39 bard, Mith Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Pickle [mailto:scottp@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 12:51 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Staff of writhing


From: Scott Pickle <scottp@...>

I haven't personally done this quest, but someone told me about it, and I
pass it on to you in hopes you can figure it out.

*Speculative Spoiler*

Supposedly, in South Karana there is a NPC named Rathmana (sp?). Bring him a
popular magical staff, and the head of an evening-spawning undead creature,
and you'll supposedly get something that combines the two in return. Both
items can be retrieved at the shore of nearby waters...

Now, I left out the details so you can still do some exploring on your own.
You might want to be cautious with the details of the quest as it would be
an "OUCH" of a mistake to give him the wrong things.

Dendall, Ollave of the Soerbaird
http://www.soerbaird.com


-----Original Message-----
From: David Rubino [mailto:tigger@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 12:53 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Staff of writhing


From: David Rubino <tigger@...>


From the EQLizer:

The staff of writhing is one of the various skull staff's in the game(which
look similar to the staff that the Priest of Discord is equipping). This
particular staff is a 1 handed blunt weapon and can be equipped by
Necromancers, Enchanters, Wizards, Magicians and Bards. It has a damage of
9, a delay of 33 and has the effect of chaotic feedback(which does 48
points of damage when successful).

I haven't been impressed with most weapons I have seen so far, but this
sounds like a real treat. Any idea where to find one?

I would be willing to train my 1H Blunt to use this, since it has a very
nice magical effect.

Working on using EQLizer for some complete weapon analysis, will post soon.

-Musil
